TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1053
TEI.2.document_title: H. Connell to Stephen F. Austin, 03-01-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: H. Connell to Austin, March 1,1825. Intentions to move to Texas.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1053

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*H. Connell to Austin, March 1,1825. Intentions to move to Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Woodville*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="03-01-1825">March 1st 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir,*/p*
*p*I wrote a letter to you a few days ago by *person_mentioned*Mr. George Huff*/person_mentioned* by the way of *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned*, informing you that it was my intention to procure and settle the *location_mentioned*League of land*/location_mentioned* that you had promised *person_mentioned*Messrs Huff and Holliman*/person_mentioned* to reserve for me, and will leave here on the first of *date_mentioned n="06-01-1825">June next*/date_mentioned*, for your *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* for that purpose, and request the favour of you still to retain it for me as I am determined to procure it if possible and no accident happens.*person_mentioned* Mr. K. Holliman*/person_mentioned* wrote to you by *person_mentioned*Mr. L. Ramey*/person_mentioned* who is gone with *person_mentioned*Mr. Huff*/person_mentioned* informing you that he could not go before the *date_mentioned n="11-01-1825">first of November next*/date_mentioned* and his reasons etc which you will receive—*person_mentioned*Mr. Michael Holliman*/person_mentioned* will go with me together with several *person_mentioned*others */person_mentioned*all with the same views—The bearer *person_mentioned*Mr. William P. Perkins*/person_mentioned* is waiting on me and have not time to say more at present but will write again if an opportunity offers for fear of miscareges—*/p* *p* *person_mentioned* H. CONNELL*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
